actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To provide for a study of hazardous air pollutants by the National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences.

summary.text: Requires the National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences to conduct an epidemiological study (over a period of at least four years) and report to the Congress on the health effects of hazardous air pollutants in Staten Island, New York, and in at least two other areas of the United States.

titles.title: To provide for a study of hazardous air pollutants by the National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences.
